author: Lynne N
title: Birthday visit
text: We have just returned from a four night stay, celebrating my husband's birthday. Our room was lovely, breakfast was very good and the staff were all very friendly. We would definitely stay there again. When we got back from our day out, a card had been left for my husband, wishing him happy birthday and offering us a complimentary glass of Prosecco each. We hadn't told them, they had read his date of birth on our booking form. It was a very thoughtful touch.
